title: Pirates
lines: Pirates can be found anywhere in the world and usually spawn in groups of up to 6 pirates. They will always try to attack and kill you no matter your bounty.
Pirates besides you will also attack Bandits.
Strong: Normal health, High attack damage, Normal speed, Normal knockback resistance
Thin: Low health, Low attack damage, High speed, No knockback resistance
Fat: High health, Normal attack damage, Low speed, Big knockback resistance
Killing a pirate reduces your bounty by 200 berries.
